command.text: if &Tiny.External.ConfigEvent; = 1 select '1' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQuery; else select '0' as view_index&ExportImportTemplateQuery;

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @nam)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from dccdtk b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and b.nam = @nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

processing.text:
declare @q nvarchar(4000), @field varchar(32), @user int, @admin bit, @r int, @d datetime select @admin = @@admin, @user = @@userID, @d = getDate()
if @admin = 0 and @type = '1' begin if @@sysDatabaseName.dbo.AI_ERP$System$GetAuthorize(@admin, @user, 'AccountBalanceAdjustment', 'Edit') = 0 select @type = '0' end
-- Checking &Checking; &EndErrorMode;
update @@table set du_co_nt00 = 0 where du_no_nt00 <> 0 update @@table set du_co00 = 0 where du_no00 <> 0
-- Delete if @type = '0' delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from dccdtk b where b.nam = @nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk ) select a.* into #k from @@table a join dccdtk b on b.nam = @nam and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk delete @@table from @@table a where exists(select 1 from #k b where a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and a.tk = b.tk)
-- Insert &Inserting;
insert into cdtk(nam, ma_dvcs, tk, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, du_no1, du_co1, du_no_nt1, du_co_nt1, status, datetime0, datetime2, user_id0, user_id2) select @nam, ma_dvcs, tk, du_no00, du_co00, du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00, 0, 0, 0, 0, '1', @d, @d, @user, @user from @@table a where not exists (select 1 from cdtk where nam = @nam and tk = a.tk and ma_dvcs = a.ma_dvcs)
update a set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join @@table b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs
if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where nam_bd = @nam) update a set du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join @@table b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs
-- Update if @type = '1' begin &Updating; and a.nam = @nam
update a set du_no00 = b.du_no00, du_co00 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt00 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt00 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #k b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs
if not exists(select 1 from dmstt where nam_bd = @nam) update a set du_no1 = b.du_no00, du_co1 = b.du_co00, du_no_nt1 = b.du_no_nt00, du_co_nt1 = b.du_co_nt00 from cdtk a join #k b on a.nam = @nam and a.tk = b.tk and a.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs end
